item.title: Changelog
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: There is a site dedicated to standardizing changelogs: keepachangelog.com. That one is more detailed than the GNU “Style of Change Logs”. I’m a fan of changelogs, it is one of the first things that I look for when exploring a new repo. So please, include a changelog for your project. Oh, and includes dates in […]
item.content:encoded:
There is a site dedicated to standardizing changelogs: keepachangelog.com. That one is more detailed than the GNU “Style of Change Logs”.

I’m a fan of changelogs, it is one of the first things that I look for when exploring a new repo. So please, include a changelog for your project. Oh, and includes dates in the changelog, it makes them more useful.
